Hydras/Perceptor/Starstorm:

Hydras, Perceptor and Starstorm reached the cannon and waited... 
expecting who would come 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> "As you command royalty." Inferno replied. He nudged Quickstrike 
who
> was still sleeping.
> "H-Huh? O-oh right! Sure thing." Quickstrike studdered as he woke 
up. 
> 
> Inferno took flight towards the cannon installation.  Quickstrike
> followed on foot.
> "Where the heck are we goin'?" He mumbled to himself.
> 
> Elsewhere at the predicon base.
> "Wazzpiantor not get blown up this time!"  the wasp flew to the
> weapons roon and grabbed a missle.  
> "This time Wazzzpinator do the blowing up! Waspinator drop bomb on
> enemy and boom!" He he flew out of the base carrying the bomb with 
him.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras/Puppet Hydras :
> > 
> > "I got it"said the male and "Opened a com link to all preds "To 
al 
> > PRed go to defend the cannon, Unicron are attemping to destroy 
it 
> > and we have stop his minions!!!!!"
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > > 
> > > The Maximal ships sensors pick up the Sweep assault force, 
> > signaling alarms.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus looks up, his mind still thinking of Nightlight's 
> > situation. Rodimus turns to face a monitor.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus: What on Cybertron is going on!
> > > 
> > > Kup is at the monitor in an instant, looking over the data.
> > > 
> > > Kup: Nightlight isnt our only problem now. This shows that a 
large 
> > force is entering Earths atmosphere. The trajectory shows them 
> > heading for the connon site. They...
> > > 
> > > Kup's optics grow wide, his mouth open as shock overtakes him.
> > > 
> > > Kup: Roddy, their configuraton match those of the Sweeps! I'm 
not 
> > detecting any Decepticon signatures though.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus' face grows serious. He stands behind Kup, looking 
over 
> > his shoulder. He studies the data for a moment.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus: Their Sweeps alright. Just like Scourge's goons back 
in 
> > the day. Not Decepticons thought. They must be Unicron's troops 
> > then. Remember he created the original Sweeps, along with 
Scourge, 
> > Cyclonus and Galvatron by reformatting Decepticons. Unicron must 
> > have learned of the connon project. The Minions he sent must 
have 
> > told him. Now he has ordered a massive strike on it to pave the 
way 
> > for his arrival.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus thinks over this dire situation for another few 
moments.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: This could be both bad a good for us. The good 
> > thing is that if Unicron feels that he must strike like this 
then 
> > the cannon must be capable of stopping him and hes scared. The 
bad 
> > thing is that its going to take one hell of a defensive effort 
to 
> > stop the Sweeps.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus looks to the Maximals and Autobot in the room.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: Kup, make an announcement. Round up the 
Maximals. 
> > I'll contact the other commanders.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus heads to a communciation station. Meanwhile Kup opens 
a 
> > commlink on all Maximal/Autobot channels.
> > > 
> > > Kup: Maximals this is Security Chief Kup. A serious situation 
has 
> > arised. Unicron has sent a massive force to strike at the cannon 
> > that is being constructed to defend against Unicron. All 
Maximals as 
> > well as other fections will be needed to defend it. Orders are 
here 
> > by issued to all Maximals and allies to report immedietly to the 
> > cannon construction site for battle. Good luck and may Primus 
watch 
> > over all of you. Kup out.
> > > 
> > > Kup closes the link.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus has set up repeating subspace visual/audio signal to 
be 
> > sent to the other faction commanders.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: This is Maximal Commander Rodimus Prime calling 
the 
> > Predacon and Tripredacus Commanders. We have detected a assault 
> > force arriving on the planet. This force is headed for the 
cannon. 
> > The force seems to consist of Sweeps, similar to the old 
Decepticon 
> > class. This leads us to believe that this force is a pre-emptive 
> > strike by Unicron. I'm sending every bot that the Maximals have 
to 
> > defend the cannon. I suggest that the Predacons and Tripredacus 
do 
> > the same. I hope to see you on the battle field. Prime out.
> > > 
> > > Roddy closses that channel and faces the other bots in the 
room.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: Ok guys, its time. Transform and roll out!
> > > 
> > > Kup dashes through the halls, checking the ammo for his rifle 
on 
> > the way. Once outside he transforms to his truck mode and heads 
for 
> > the cannon.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus waits behind to make sure everyone follows their 
orders.
> > > 
> > > OOC: I'm ready for a good ol' fight!
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > Hellplague:
> > > 
> > > The Sweep commander slowed as the rest of her assault team 
exited 
> > he 
> > > hold.  As the last of them flew out, sh signalled the strike 
force 
> > to 
> > > begin re entry, which lasted  many long cycles.  After they 
> > entered 
> > > Earth's atmosphe, they corrected thir course and made a bee 
line 
> > for 
> > > the cannon, whose purpose was to destroy their master, and 
they 
> > > couldn't have that.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > OOC:
> > > Maximals- You can detect the large force of Sweeps and send 
help 
> > to 
> > > the cannon.
> > > 
> > > Predacons- The cannon may be taken by suprise, depending if 
you 
> > > detect the minions as well.
> > > 
> > >
